limitActionsToAtWills.Label: Limit Actions to At-Wills
limitActionsToAtWills.Hint: Instead of showing all powers that deal damage in the Actions tab/panel by default, limit it to only at-wills. This is equivalent to the default D&DBeyond behavior.

includeOneMinutePowers.Label: Include Minute-long Powers as Actions
includeOneMinutePowers.Hint: Include powers with a duration of one minute or less (e.g. 1 round) and an activation time of 1 Action or 1 Bonus Action (e.g. Bless, Bane, Command) in the Actions tab/panel by default.

includePowersWithEffects.Label: Include Powers with Active Effects as Actions
includePowersWithEffects.Hint: Include powers with active effects attached (e.g. Barkskin) in the Actions tab/panel by default.

includeConsumables.Label: Include Consumables as Actions
includeConsumables.Hint: Include consumables which have an activation cost (Action, Bonus Action, etc) in the Actions list by default.

injectCharacters.Label: Inject Character Actions List
injectCharacters.Hint: Should this module inject an Actions List into the default character sheet? Note that if you are using a sheet module which integrates the actions list on its own, this will not affect that sheet.

injectNPCs.Label: Inject NPC Actions List
injectNPCs.Hint: Should this module inject an Actions List into the default npc sheet? Note that if you are using a sheet module which integrates the actions list on its own, this will not affect that sheet.

injectVehicles.Label: Inject Vehicle Actions List
injectVehicles.Hint: Should this module inject an Actions List into the default vehicle sheet? Note that if you are using a sheet module which integrates the actions list on its own, this will not affect that sheet.
